CROSSBLADE.Settings.Module.Enable.Name: Enable Crossblade
CROSSBLADE.Settings.Module.Enable.Hint: Enable Crossblade sound layers. Sounds are still loaded when disabled. The GM must disable the module to disable all processing entirely.
Process Crossblade combat events, such as when the the combat turn order is changed.
CROSSBLADE.Settings.Events.CombatPauseEv: Process Crossblade pause event in combat.
CROSSBLADE.Settings.Events.Custom.Name: Custom Crossblade Event
CROSSBLADE.Settings.Events.Custom.Hint: A custom event that can possibly trigger layer fades for a currently playing playlist sound. You can also modify this with a macro calling game.modules.get('crossblade').api.setCustomEvent('customEvent')
CROSSBLADE.Settings.Events.CustomOptions: A comma-seperated list of options to be used when rendering the custom event entry on the playlists tab. The custom event can still be set to another value via a macro. Leave blank to allow any value.
CROSSBLADE.Settings.UI.PlaylistDirectory: Show an input with the current custom event in the playlists sidebar tab.
CROSSBLADE.Layers.Name: Crossblade Sound Layers
CROSSBLADE.Layers.Help:
Configure Crossblade sound layers that will be faded in instead of the main audio source in response to specific events.
For all events that do not have a sound layer configured here, Crossblade will default to fading in the main audio source instead.
You can also configure a layer using the same file as the main audio source here if you want it to fade in for specific events.
CROSSBLADE.Sound.Layer.Name: Crossblade Sound Layer
CROSSBLADE.SimultaneousPlaybackReminder: Crossblade will only work on playlists that are configured for Simultaneous Playback mode.
CROSSBLADE.Events.Default.Label: Default
CROSSBLADE.Events.Default.Description: The default event that triggers when no other applicable events occur
CROSSBLADE.Events.Combatant.Label: Combatant
CROSSBLADE.Events.Combatant.Description: An event based on the current combatant's disposition in combat.
CROSSBLADE.Events.CombatantTag.Label: Combatant+
CROSSBLADE.Events.CombatantTag.Descripti: An custom event based on the current combatant's tag. Requires Tagger.
CROSSBLADE.Events.Game.Label: Game
CROSSBLADE.Events.Game.Description: An event regarding the game's state, such as when the game is paused by the GM.
CROSSBLADE.Events.Custom.Label: Custom
CROSSBLADE.Events.Custom.Description: A custom event, triggered manually by a macro.
CROSSBLADE.Migration.VersionTooOldWarnin: Previous Crossblade version is too old to migrate data.
CROSSBLADE.Migration.Needed.Dialog.Title: Crossblade Data Migration Needed
CROSSBLADE.Migration.Needed.Dialog.Conte: A new update to Crossblade requires a migration of sound data. Proceed?
